Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Apr 2019On theory, it sounds like a sound plan. Clear the higher interest loan then clear the lower interest loan.In reality, nah. Getting more loans to pay off loans is a bad idea. Talk to the bank, get a debt consolidation plan and pay it off before getting new cards or loans.Fundamentally, you have to watch your spending habits. Spend within your means.0 comments0
